attributes.action: All paid carers to get a pay rise
attributes.background:
The government must make it law that all carers get a pay rise.

Many carers have worked throughout covid endlessly without breaks and holidays it’s time carers we’re recognised also.

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the pay of community and social care workers, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Increase local authority funding to pay for increase in pay for social workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/571609
